name: Safari 15.3 (v. 16612.4.9.1.8 and 15612.4.9.1.8)
available: macOS Big Sur and macOS Catalina

advisories.available: macOS Big Sur and macOS Catalina
advisories.impact: Processing maliciously crafted web content may lead to arbitrary code execution. Apple is aware of a report that this issue may have been actively exploited.
advisories.description: A use after free issue was addressed with improved memory management.
advisories.note: After installing this update, the build number for Safari 15.3 is 16612.4.9.1.8 on macOS Big Sur and 15612.4.9.1.8 on macOS Catalina.
